Description.Text: Residenza Parco Fellini is a luxurious 4-star property offering refined accommodation near the heart of Rimini. Highlights include two outdoor swimming pools, gourmet restaurants and a private beach. The elegant district of Marina Centro boasts a great range of upscale restaurants, bars and shops. Nearby places of interest include the Old Town, the ruins of the 2nd-century Roman amphitheatre and the Tempio Malatestiano cathedral. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Rimini destinations. The hotel occupies a mid-rise building featuring elegant Neoclassical architecture. Facilities include two outdoor swimming pools, a private beach and a spa complex offering a range of massages and wellness treatments, an indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, sauna and relaxation area. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Classic rooms are decorated in a traditional style with warm colours and patterned fabrics. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and air-conditioning. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. La Dolce Vita restaurant offers Italian cuisine, while Veranda serves international, Mediterranean and regional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the 17th-century themed bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
